bridge-type.label: Serial ZStick
bridge-type.description: ZWave USB Stick with Serial Interface

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Serial Port
parameter.description: Set the serial port used to access the ZWave stick

parameter.name: master
parameter.label: Controller is Master
parameter.description:
This controller is the master controller in the network.
The binding will perform automatic configuration of the network. This setting should be set to true unless you have another controller that is required to run the network.

parameter.name: SUC
parameter.label: Controller is SUC
parameter.description: Controller is SUC and will receive updates from other controllers in the network

parameter.name: polling
parameter.label: Default Poll Period
parameter.description: Sets the default polling period used to poll the primary parameters

channel-type.label: Start Frames
channel-type.description: Counter tracking the number of SOF bytes received

channel-type.label: Frames Acknowledged
channel-type.description: Counter tracking the number of frames acknowldeged by the controller

channel-type.label: Frames Rejected
channel-type.description: Counter tracking the number of frames rejected by the controller

channel-type.label: Frames Cancelled
channel-type.description: Counter tracking the number of frames cancelled by the controller

channel-type.label: OOF Bytes Received
channel-type.description: Counter tracking the number of out of flow bytes recieved
